name: Error 4516
description:
You work the night shift at a local office building. All you have to do is patrol the building, and work your way to the exit. An unusual job, but you need the cash. What you do not realize however, is that your job is more than meets the eye.

Error 4516 is a navigational horror game, the main objective is to make it out alive each night. You must listen closely and choose the path you will take as one wrong turn could be your end.

Different audio queues helps clarify the path you should take each night, so listen intently.

This game has no relation/affiliation with the popular horror game Five Nights at Freddy's, nor does it try to mimic it's style.
